dataIdInfo.idAbs: Use this tool to generate the 3D City Information Model (3DCIM) database schema or parts of it.

tool.name: SchemaGenerator
tool.toolboxalias: ArcGIS for 3D Cities Database Schema Tools

param.name: generate_classes
param.expression: {SpatialVolumeAnnotation | SpatialPointAnnotation | SpatialAreaAnnotation | SpatialLineAnnotation | Building | BuildingEntrancePoint | BuildingShell | BuildingShellPart | SupportingStructure | Fence | BuildingInteriorSpace | BuildingFloor | BuildingInteriorStructure | InteriorInstallation | StreetFurniture | Sensor | SensorCoverage | Sign | Tree | ZoningDistrict | Parcel | LandCover | AdministrativeDistrict | TransportNetworkSegment}

param.name: generate_relationships
param.expression: {BuildingHasEntrance | BuildingHasShell | BuildingHasShellPart | BuildingHasSpace | BuildingHasFloor | FloorHasSpace | FloorHasStructure | SensorHasCoverage | SpaceHasInstallation | SpaceHasUsage | ZoneHasRegulation | ZoneHasUsage | ParcelHasRegulation | ParcelHasNeigborhood | ParcelHasUsage}

tool.summary: Use this tool to generate the 3D City Information Model (3DCIM) database schema or parts of it.
tool.usage: Create an empty File Geodatabase, run this tool, select the new File Geodatabase and fill in the parameters.
